title: The Death of Germanicus
marks:
Inscription

LLC, printed in red: [Monsieur du P
description: after Poussin painting of the same subject; reclining Germanicus on a bed with flowing drapery behind at left; three women--one weeping--and child at left; soldiers with spears at left; printed in red-orange; received matted with L2009.66.2.1
creditline: Gift of funds from Kaywin Feldman and Jim Lutz in honor of John E. Andrus III's 100th birthday
